parameters.command:
=cat > /tmp/veo3_config.json << 'EOF'
{{ JSON.stringify({ mode: "image", prompt: $('Extract Prompt Pairs').first().json.promptPairs[0].imagePrompt, outputPath: "/tmp/veo3_scene.png" }) }}
EOF
node /home/node/veo3-shorts-simple.js /tmp/veo3_config.json

parameters.command:

{{ JSON.stringify({ mode: "frame", prompt: $('Parse First Image Result').first().json.promptPairs[0].videoPrompt, imagePath: "/tmp/veo3_scene.png", projectUrl: $('Parse First Image Result').first().json.projectUrl, download: $('Parse First Image Result').first().json.promptPairs[0].isLast, outputPath: "/tmp/veo3_final.mp4" }) }}
EOF
node /home/node/veo3-shorts-simple.js /tmp/veo3_config.json

parameters.content:
## Main Flow
First image → First video → Check completion

## Upload & Complete
Read file → Upload → Update sheet → Notify

## Loop (Remaining Scenes)
Generate image → Generate video → Check if last
